籤詩版本二:
Amanzi abandayo nesuphu ebilayo engatshisiyo, ingabandi okanye ishushu kodwa idikidiki
Ukungenzi nto yimbi ehlabathini, ukomelela kuzo zonke iintlobo zobugcisa
詩意:
Le hexagram luphawu lokusetyenziswa kakuhle kwezinto.
Yonke into izinzile kwaye ilungile.
解曰: Amabanjwa axolelwe. Isifo sidibana nogqirha olungileyo. Funa ubutyebi nethemba. Imiyalelo ebalaseleyo.
籤詩故事一:
◇Lintong Rescue
Late Sui Dynasty. UKumkani uLi Yuan woBukhosi bamaTang wadlula ngakuloo mthi utyala induli emazantsi eNtaba iLintong, ngequbuliso, inyambalala yamadoda anamandla abaleka ephuma ehlathini, evala indlela ngemikhonto emide namazembe, efuna ukuwabulala. ULi Yuan wayengqongwe kwaye yayibaluleke kakhulu.
Ngeli xesha, uShubao wayesele eza kulala kwiTempile yaseWuyuan, wamangaliswa xa ngokukhawuleza weva isandi samadoda namahashe ekhwaza ukufa ngaphandle kwetempile. Ngoko nangoko wakhwela ihashe lakhe waza wabaleka waya phakathi kwentaba, kwakugquba umsi nothuli kuyo yonke indawo emazantsi entaba, kukhwazwa abantu ababulawayo.
Ngesantya sombane, uShu Bao wangena egxalathelana wabulala inkitha yabantu ngokulandelelana, Iintshaba zabaleka macala onke.
Usindise usapho lukaLi Yuan. Oko kukuthi, waphinda wasetyenziswa ngukumkani waseTang Dynasty. Waba ligorha elisungula iTang Dynasty.
聖意: Umzi wosapho uzingxamele ubutyebi, kugqitywe ukuthengiselana, kugqitywe umtshato, amadoda ahamba ngeenyawo afika emasimini, kuphekwe iimpethu zesilika, kuchume imfuyo emithandathu, kukhangelwa abantu, lichithakale ityala. , ukufuduka kulungile, impahla elahlekileyo ifunyenwe, isifo sikhuselekile, ingcwaba lentaba lilungile, kwaye ithamsanqa lilungile.
